name: Dreamy Druid
description:
Dreamy Druid is a 2D pixel art platformer where you play a druid that needs to escape his nightmares, while running through your dreams you have to use different animal forms in order to overcome obstacles.

Controls:

  • AD/Left Stick - move player
  • Space/A - Jump
  • R/Y - Reset
  • ArrowKeys/RightStick - switch forms
  • Shift/RT - special ability
